fullContent: Home› HorseHorse Family Animal SimulatorBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenHorse Family Animal Simulator is an open-world horse game where you explore, complete quests, and build your own horse family. Experience the wild in cute 3D poly visuals, roam across a vast landscape, and enjoy the sounds of nature as you gallop through fields, forests, and rivers. Take on the role of a horse, complete missions to earn coins and XP, and protect your family from dangers lurking in the wild.ControlsWASD / Arrow keys: MoveSpacebar: JumpShift: RunLeft Click: Attack, pick up plants, start missionsComplete QuestsAs you explore the vast open world, you’ll encounter other wild horses that offer quests. These missions can vary, but they generally fall into two categories:Item Collection: Some horses might ask you to find and bring them specific objects scattered across the land. This could include rare plants, lost items, or hidden treasures.Combat Challenges: Others may require you to defend the herd by fighting off predators like other horses, wolves, snakes, and spiders. These battles test your strength and ability to protect yourself and others.Completing quests rewards you with coins and XP, helping you level up and improve your abilities. Always check the map to see if there are any active quests nearby.Build Your FamilyYour journey isn’t just about survival, it’s also about building a family. As you roam the world, you’ll come across potential mates. Once you find a compatible female horse, you can form a bond and start your own herd.At level 3, you’ll unlock the ability to have a baby horse.Your foal will start small and weak, requiring food to grow.As you continue playing, your family will grow stronger, and you’ll need to protect and provide for them.Survive in the WildStaying alive means constantly keeping an eye on your hunger and safety. Your horse needs to eat regularly to maintain energy. The energy levels drain more quickly especially while running. Food sources include:Grasses and plants found throughout the map.Special herbs that may offer additional benefits.Your foal and mate will also require food. If you don’t feed them, their health will decline, making them more vulnerable to attacks.Predators are always lurking, and you must stay alert. Wolves, rats, sheeps, snakes, and spiders roam the land, waiting for the right moment to strike. If an enemy approaches:Use quick movements to dodge attacks, use left click to attack back.Strike back using your horse’s strength.If outnumbered, consider retreating to safety by holding shift while walking.Manage & UpgradeYour horse family’s well-being depends on how well you manage their energy, attack power, and XP levels. Tap the heart icon at the top right of your screen to:Monitor each family member’s health and stamina.Check their attack strength to see if they can defend themselves.Track their XP to see when they’ll level up.To make your horse stronger, press the star icon to upgrade key abilities, including:Speed: Run faster to escape threats or reach destinations quicker.Strength: Increase attack damage to fight off enemies more effectively.Endurance: Improve stamina so you can run for longer periods without slowing down.Explore & Expand Your FamilyYour home is a safe place where you can rest, but you’re not limited to one area. By using the map, you can:See available quests and locate NPC horses who need help.Return home instantly if you need a break or to check on your family.Upgrade your home with useful items to make life easier for your herd.Expanding your home lets you raise a stronger family and prepare for future challenges. As you progress, you’ll unlock new areas to explore and additional achievements to complete.Stay focused on completing quests, protecting your family, and upgrading your horse to become the strongest in the wild!Who Created Horse Family Animal Simulator?The game was developed by CyberGoldfinch, known for creating immersive animal simulators.More Horse GamesIf you enjoy exploring nature, survival elements, and family-building mechanics, you might also like other horse games online.
